items.title: Islamic State leader in Iraq and Syria killed, US says
items.description: Abdallah Makki Muslih al-Rifa was head of IS's most senior decision-making body, the US Central Command said.

items.title: South African ambassador 'no longer welcome' in US, Rubio says
items.description: The US Secretary of State called the ambassador a "race-baiting politician who hates America".

items.title: Search continues in Dominican Republic for missing student Sudiksha Konanki
items.description: The search for the missing University of Pittsburgh student, who was on spring break in Punta Cana, is entering its second week.

items.title: Ovens and bone fragments - BBC visits Mexican cartel 'extermination' site
items.description: The BBC's Will Grant visits the site believed to have been used by drug cartels to dispose of victims' remains.

items.title: 'Their untold stories need to be told': Teens capture India's labourers in pictures
items.description: Teen photographers showcased the backbreaking work done by India's 400 million labourers.
